item.title: Create Open Graph Image generator, introducing imagin.live
item.description: We need an image for each of our blog post to make it stand out on social media. But generating for each one for our post is not fun. That’s why you’ll love Imagin! I write regularly on my blog, I know it’s not fun to have to prepare Social/OpenGraph Image for each one of the post. We just want to write! This is a dynamic image generator, where the image will change according to your title.
